=== Background ===

I've worked on low level operating system code since the early 1980s.  I started using Linux with Slackware 3.1.  After using Mandrake and SUSE for a few years I started using Ubuntu around 2007.

=== Work in Ubuntu ===

I joined Canonical in April 2010 as part of the Linaro team.  I have been maintaining the u-boot-linaro and linux-linaro packages since September 2010.
